title: Part 130 - CLAIM FOR FUNDS HELD BY THE OFFICE OF UNCLAIMED FUNDS OWED TO A DECEDENT OR A DECEDENT'S ESTATE QUALIFYING AS A SMALL ESTATE
content:
Part 130 - CLAIM FOR FUNDS HELD BY THE OFFICE OF UNCLAIMED FUNDS OWED TO A DECEDENT OR A DECEDENT'S ESTATE QUALIFYING AS A SMALL ESTATE
State Regulations
§ 130.1 - Purpose
§ 130.2 - Acceptance of affidavits under scpa section 1310
§ 130.3 - Other requirements

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
